# MaplePrints

> Premium Business Card Printing Service in Canada

MaplePrints offers high-quality business cards with velvet matte finishes, foil stamping, and spot UV options. We provide a unique "hand-in-hand" design service where customers work directly with a professional designer via WhatsApp.

## Main Pages

- [Home](https://mapleprints.ca/) - Main landing page with services and portfolio.
- [Package](https://mapleprints.ca/package.html) - Our all-inclusive $250 premium package details.
- [Design](https://mapleprints.ca/design.html) - Information about our design services.
- [Blog](https://mapleprints.ca/blog.html) - Tips and guides for business cards and networking.
- [Testimonials](https://mapleprints.ca/testimonials.html) - Customer reviews and success stories.

## Key Offerings

- **Premium Package**: 1000 cards, velvet matte, foil/UV, NFC keychain, design support.
- **Design Service**: Direct WhatsApp communication with designers.
- **Materials**: Velvet matte paper, gold/silver foil, spot UV coating.
